Description.Name: Michael Fastback
Description.Details: Background: Michael Fastback, renowned as "Razor" is a battle-hardened MechWarrior known for his lightning-fast reflexes and precision in combat. Hailing from a lineage of MechWarriors, he inherited an affinity for piloting BattleMechs from an early age. Today his expertise in piloting and tactical finesse make him a formidable adversary, able to swiftly engage and disengage with deadly efficiency.
